text: Shivajith Padmanabhan is an Indian actor from Kerala who made his debut in Malayalam movie with renowned director Jayaraj's Veeram 2016 == Early life == Shivajith was born on 16 December 1982 to parents Padmanabhan Nambiar and Madanavalli. He has a sister Shijina Padmanabhan. Shivajith started pursuing his passion for arts early in life and started learning Kathakali, Bharathanaatyam, Kuchippudi and also to play Mridangam. He won the title of ‘Kalaaprathibha’ for two consecutive years 1998 & 1999 at the Kerala State Youth Festival, breaking all the existing records. For ‘Veeram’ he practiced ‘Kalari’ for two years and his skills as a Kalari artist is a major highlight of the movie where he portrayed the legendary Aaromal Chekavar. ==Awards== 1998,1999 Kalaprathibha at Kerala School Kalolsavam in Kathakali, Bharatanatyam, Kuchipudi, Mohiniyattam, folk dance 2000 Mathrubhoomi Kalolsavam State Winner. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable" |+ !Year !Title !Character !Director !Language |- |2016 |Veeram |Aromal Chekaver |Jayaraj |Malayalam, Hindi, English |- |2018 |Ranam |Rajan Nambiar |Nirmal Sahadev |Malayalam |- |2019 |Kalki |Amarnath |Praveen Prabharam |Malayalam |- |2020 |Backpackers |Kattoor Jolly |Jayaraj |Malayalam |- |2020 |Kurup |Shahu |Srinath Rajendran |Malayalam |} == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:Male actors in Malayalam cinema Category:1982 births
title: Shivajith Padmanabhan
